title: Yumx - Food Ordering App
desc: YumX is a mobile application designed to streamline the food ordering experience in a restaurant-like environment. It allows users to browse menus, place customized orders, and receive real-time updates—all through an intuitive and visually appealing interface.

title: Custom Langing page
desc: This is a beautifully designed authentication landing page for a travel-themed application. It features both login and signup flows with a sleek, responsive UI. The design includes a vibrant, global backdrop that showcases famous landmarks, reinforcing the theme of international exploration. The login options include Google OAuth and email/password, while the signup form supports basic user input fields.As the designer and developer, I crafted both the user flow and interface, focusing on an engaging first impression and smooth user experience.

title: GameLive - eSports App
desc: GameLive is a real-time mobile application built for eSports and gaming enthusiasts. It delivers up-to-date match scores, player stats, and game highlights directly to users, helping them stay connected with their favorite games and tournaments.

title: Amica - Social Media App

title: Runner - Fitness App
desc: Runner is the first mobile app I’ve built using React Native. It’s designed to track a runner’s live statistics, including the total miles they've run. The app offers real-time feedback on a map as the user progresses and provides post-run performance summaries. It also includes a motivational feature that fetches quotes dynamically based on random or user-defined keywords to keep runners inspired throughout their journey.
